author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make a setup like HGCal TB with 47 all-silicon layers of detectors (26 for EE and 21 for HE) with some lateral structure. It is useful to make a study of reconstruction

#### PR validation:

Use geant4 overlap check and also ran a sample job of simulation

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx363X Make a setup like HGCal TB with 47 all-silicon layers of detectors (26 for EE and 21 for HE) with some lateral structure
